turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, I'm looking for some movie recommendations. I'm in the mood for something… thrilling, I guess? Like a really good suspense movie.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I understand. For suspense movies, I can recommend 'Prisoners,' 'Parasite,' or 'The Silence of the Lambs.' Are any of those appealing, or would you like other options?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, I've seen 'Silence of the Lambs,' great movie! 'Prisoners' sounds interesting. But actually, can you give me recommendations for something that also has a sci-fi element mixed in with the suspense? Is that even a thing?

turns.speaker: agent
